## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have run the linter and fixed all issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] E2E tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested edge cases

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added docstrings to new functions/classes
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if applicable)

### Database

- [ ] I have created database migrations (if needed)
- [ ] Migrations are backward compatible
- [ ] I have tested migrations on a copy of production data

### Security

- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not committed any secrets or sensitive data
- [ ] I have considered the security implications of my changes

### Deployment

- [ ] My changes are backward compatible
- [ ] I have considered the deployment strategy
- [ ] Environment variables documented (if new ones added)
- [ ] I have tested locally with production-like settings
